'''Stone of Remembrance''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained by making offerings to [[Statue of The Seven]] in [[Liyue]]. The player are able to collect up to 9 stones through offering to the Statue of the Seven.

It is used during the {{Quest|Nine Pillars of Peace}} by inserting it into one of the nine pillars surrounding [[Cuijue Slope]].
